name: Zeus
shortDescriPtion: He has so much love to give and can't wait to share that with his future adopters.His ideal home would be that with older children
longDescriPtion: This rambunctious young pup has so much to learn and is looking for an experienced adopter to help him out. Zeus has a lot of energy, and is still working on his training. He has so much love to give and can't wait to share that with his future adopters. His ideal home would be that with older children and no other canine siblings as he prefers to be the only dog in the home.  If you would like to learn more about Zeus, visit him at our Port Washington, NY Adoption Center.

name: Eloise
shortDescriPtion: Eloise is a sweet older lady looking for the perfect home to help her enjoy her golden years! when her owner could no longer care for her.
longDescriPtion: Eloise is a sweet older lady looking for the perfect home to help her enjoy her golden years! Eloise found herself back at our shelter after 7 years when her owner could no longer care for her. Eloise is a bit shy at first but give her some time and she will never leave your side. She loves spending time outside and can’t wait to make your backyard her new favorite spot! Eloise is looking for experienced adopters who can give this sweet senior the home of her dreams. She would prefer a home without children and would like to meet any potential canine siblings. Visit Eloise today at our adoption center in Port Washington, NY.

name: Phineas
shortDescriPtion: Sweet Phineas has had a rough start to life. As a result, he is slow to warm up to new people and is looking for a home with experienced dog
longDescriPtion: Sweet Phineas has had a rough start to life. As a result, he is slow to warm up to new people and is looking for a home with experienced dog owners to help him build his confidence. His favorite activities include napping with his stuffed toys and running around in our yards. He is a homebody and would prefer a calm, quiet neighborhood to relax in. If given time and patience, Phineas will become your new best friend. He will never leave your side. Visit Phineas today at our adoption center in Port Washington, NY.

name: Bruno
shortDescriPtion: I'm just one of the available puppies waiting to meet you at our Alex and Elisabeth Lewyt Canine Adoption Center at our Port Washington, NY campus.
longDescriPtion: I'm just one of the available puppies waiting to meet you at our Alex and Elisabeth Lewyt Canine Adoption Center at our Port Washington, NY campus. Come visit me and all my friends today! her new favorite spot! Eloise is looking for experienced adopters who can give this sweet senior the home of her dreams. She would prefer a home without children and would like to meet any potential canine siblings. Visit Eloise today at our adoption center in Port Washington, NY.

name: Ruby
shortDescriPtion: He has so much love to give and can't wait to share that with his future adopters.His ideal home would be that with older children
longDescriPtion: This rambunctious young pup has so much to learn and is looking for an experienced adopter to help him out. Zeus has a lot of energy, and is still working on his training. He has so much love to give and can't wait to share that with his future adopters. His ideal home would be that with older children and no other canine siblings as he prefers to be the only dog in the home.  If you would like to learn more about Zeus, visit him at our Port Washington, NY Adoption Center.

name: Lion
shortDescriPtion: Lion and his bestie Miley came to us from Puerto Rico and they can’t believe their great luck! Wait until they meet and fall in love with you. Lion is a super curious,
longDescriPtion: Lion and his bestie Miley came to us from Puerto Rico and they can’t believe their great luck! Wait until they meet and fall in love with you. Lion is a super curious, outgoing guy who benefits from having the gentler sidekick Miley to settle him. Experienced cat lovers are going to get a kick out of their yin/yang relationship, and older kids are going to enjoy expertly keeping up with their antics. Our team has harnessed some of Lion’s energy with clicker training, and he’s been an outstanding student! Why choose between a super confident lion and a blissful mini house panther when you can have both?.

name: Evan
shortDescriPtion: Local 10 Month rescues Elsie and Evan complete each other. We find them a purrfect match for each other, and you’ll find two is indeed better
longDescriPtion: Local 10 Month rescues Elsie and Evan complete each other. We find them a purrfect match for each other, and you’ll find two is indeed better than one when it comes to this sibling duo. Formally shy, Elsie is now taking the lead in play groups while her brother is never far behind her. An experienced family with kids over 8 years old will have no trouble winning them over with playtime and treats, and after given time to settle into their first real home, they’ll soon be excited to learn all about family life from their favorite expert: you!

name: Jezzy
shortDescriPtion: Jezzy spent several years in her home after being rescued from a southern shelter and spending time with her Animal League America family.
longDescriPtion: Jezzy spent several years in her home after being rescued from a southern shelter and spending time with her Animal League America family. We’d hoped this sensitive 9 year old had her furever locked up, but when she was  recently in crisis, we welcomed her back, with all the reassurances she needs to put her best paws forward in search of a fresh start. We’ve seen Jezzy conquer her fears before, and we’ll be with her again to ensure that she finds a loving and committed human with a peaceful home to make her feel safe. Older children will know instinctively how to nurture her spirit with some kindness and treats. Jezzy deserves the rest of her life to be peaceful, so a home with no other pets will put her at ease. If you’d like to join Jezzy in her new beginning, she’d love a chance at happiness again.
